WebLink.url: var url = "/apex/SOLXYZCSO001__OneStepCreateReportV2?obj=Opportunity&Id={!Opportunity.Id}&name={!URLENCODE(Opportunity.Name)}&pagetype=detailpage";var options = 'width=1024,height=768,resizable=yes,menubar=no,scrollbars=yes,status=no,toolbar=no,directories=no,location=no';var newWin = window.open(url, '_blank', options);var nowRefreshing = false;if(!newWin.closed){setInterval(refreshJudge, 1000);}function refreshJudge(){if(newWin.closed && !nowRefreshing){nowRefreshing = true;window.location.href = window.location.href;}}
